LanguageData.LandingZone_BestSitesToggleTooltip: Highlight the highest-scoring landing tiles based on your current filters.
LanguageData.LandingZone_CommunityPresetsPlaceholder:
Share your perfect landing site presets!

Export your custom presets using the button below, then share your token on the Steam Workshop or RimWorld forums.

Community-curated presets coming soon!
LanguageData.LandingZone_RevertTooltip: Reset this preset to its original state
LanguageData.LandingZone_LoadedPresetForEditing: Loaded '{0}' into Advanced mode for editing
LanguageData.LandingZone_LoadPresetTooltip: Load this preset into Advanced mode for customization
LanguageData.LandingZone_PresetTooltipAction: Click to apply this preset.\nRemix: Load into Advanced mode for editing.
LanguageData.LandingZone_PresetNameExists: Preset name '{0}' already exists. Please choose a different name.
LanguageData.LandingZone_ModeHint: Preset Hub: Quick starts | Guided Builder: Goal-based wizard | Advanced: Full control
LanguageData.LandingZone_PriorityInstructions: Select 1-4 goals in priority order. Priority 1 = Critical filters, Priority 2-4 = Preferred filters.
LanguageData.LandingZone_SelectPriorityPrompt: Select at least Priority 1 to see recommendations.
LanguageData.LandingZone_AppliedToAdvanced: Applied priority-based filters to Advanced mode
LanguageData.LandingZone_CopiedToAdvanced: Simple mode settings copied to Advanced mode
LanguageData.LandingZone_CopiedToSimple: Advanced mode settings copied to Simple mode
LanguageData.LandingZone_PriorityQuestion: What's your priority for this colony?
LanguageData.LandingZone_LoadingAdvanced: Opening Advanced mode for custom feature selection...
LanguageData.LandingZone_FarmingDesc: Long growing season, fertile soil, consistent rainfall
LanguageData.LandingZone_MixedDesc: Balance of farming, hunting, and fishing
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalLoadedForEditing: Loaded '{0}' filters into Advanced mode for editing
LanguageData.LandingZone_NoBookmarksYet:
No bookmarks yet.

Click the star icon in the action bar to add bookmarks,
or use the 'BM' button in the Results window.
LanguageData.LandingZone_DeletePresetConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete '{0}'?
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTooltip: Developer tools: logging, cache dump, performance test
LanguageData.LandingZone_SearchTooltip: Search for best landing sites using {0} mode filters
LanguageData.LandingZone_TabGeographyTooltip: Hilliness, coastal access, movement difficulty, swampiness
LanguageData.LandingZone_TabResourcesTooltip: Stones, forageability, plant/animal density, fish, grazing
LanguageData.LandingZone_HighlyRestrictiveWarning: ‚ö† Highly restrictive - results may be limited.
LanguageData.LandingZone_EstimateUnavailable: (Tile count estimate unavailable for these filter types)
LanguageData.LandingZone_TipAdjustFilters: Tip: Adjust filters in left panel to refine your search
LanguageData.LandingZone_HighlightsTooltip: Toggle colored markers on the world map showing top-scoring tiles from your search results
LanguageData.LandingZone_NoSearchData: No active match data. Run a search to populate this list.
LanguageData.LandingZone_WaitingForSearch: Once LandingZone finishes a search the ranked sites will appear here.
LanguageData.LandingZone_AlreadyBookmarked: {0} tile(s) already bookmarked or capacity reached
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictRiverAnd: Impossible: {0} river types with AND (tiles have max 1 river)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictRiverSuggestion: Switch to OR operator or keep only 1 Critical river type
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictStoneAnd: Impossible requirement: {0} stones with AND operator
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictStoneSuggestion: Switch to OR operator (tiles only have 1 ore type)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictGrowingTemp: Contradictory: High growing days require warm temperatures
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictGrowingTempSuggestio: Increase minimum temperature or decrease growing days requirement
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictHighRainfall: High rainfall requirement limits biome options
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictHighRainfallSuggesti: Desert and arid biomes will be excluded
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictVeryRestrictive: Very restrictive config: Only ~{0} tiles estimated ({1} critical filters)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictVeryRestrictiveSugge: Relax some Critical‚ÜíPreferred, use Fallback Tiers, or widen ranges
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictRestrictive: Restrictive config: Only ~{0} tiles estimated ({1} critical filters)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictRestrictiveSuggestio: Consider relaxing some Critical filters to Preferred if search yields few results
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictManyCriticals: {0} Critical filters may be too restrictive
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictManyCriticalsSuggest: Consider changing some Critical filters to Preferred for more results
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictUltraRareAnd: Ultra-rare AND: {0} ultra-rare features (each <0.1% of tiles)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictUltraRareAndSuggesti: Switch to OR operator or relax some to Preferred importance
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictManyFeaturesAnd: {0} Critical features with AND may produce very few results
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictManyFeaturesAndSugge: Switch to OR operator or reduce Critical feature count
LanguageData.LandingZone_OperatorOrTooltip: OR operator: Tiles need AT LEAST ONE of the {0} selected {1}.\n\nMore flexible - typically produces more results.
LanguageData.LandingZone_OperatorAndTooltip: AND operator: Tiles need ALL {0} selected {1}.\n\nVery restrictive - may produce few or zero results.
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalClimateComfortDesc: Find a pleasant, moderate climate with comfortable temperatures year-round
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalResourceWealthDesc: Maximize available resources: minerals, plants, animals, and materials
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalDefensibilityDesc: Prioritize defensive terrain: mountains, caves, cliffs, and natural barriers
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalFoodProductionDesc: Optimize for food security through farming, hunting, or fishing
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalPowerGenerationDesc: Access to renewable energy: geothermal, wind, solar, or hydroelectric
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalTradeAccessDesc: Coastal or road access for trading and visitor traffic
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalChallengeRarityDesc: Find ultra-rare map features for challenging or unique gameplay
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalSpecificFeatureDesc: Search for specific map features, biomes, or conditions
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterTemp10to25Desc: Comfortable year-round temperatures (no extreme heat or cold)
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterRainfall600to1400Desc: Moderate rainfall (not too dry, not swampy)
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterGrowingDays30to60Desc: Long growing season for year-round crops
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterHighForageDesc: Abundant wild plants for foraging and medicine
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterHighAnimalDensityDesc: Plenty of wildlife for hunting and taming
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterHighPlantDensityDesc: Dense vegetation for wood and materials
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterCoastalOrRoadsDesc: Trade caravans and ships can reach you
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_DevModeOnly: Dev Mode only - hidden in release builds
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_DumpStarted: [LandingZone] Dumping FULL world cache (this may take a while)...
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_DumpCompleted: [LandingZone] Full world cache dump started. Check {0} for LandingZone_FullCache_[timestamp].txt
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_DumpDescription: Dumps all ~295k tiles with full property reflection.
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_PerfTestDescription: Benchmarks filter performance on current world.
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_VerboseTip: Tip: Set logging to Verbose for detailed match score breakdowns in Player.log.
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_WorldNullError: [LandingZone] WorldDataDumper: World or grid is null
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_PerfTestCheap: PerformanceTest: {0} is cheap - no optimization needed
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_PerfTestComplete: [LandingZone] Performance Test: Complete. Check results above.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_elysian_Description: The easiest RimWorld experience - perfect climate, ideal biome, abundant resources, stacked +10 quality mutators. God-tier colonist paradise.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_exotic_Description: Chase the rarest features in RimWorld - ArcheanTrees anchor (24 tiles globally), with bonus scoring for stacking additional rare mutators.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_subzero_Description: Extreme cold survival challenge - frozen tundra, ice sheets, barely any growing season. For masochists only.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_scorched_Description: Volcanic nightmare - extreme heat, lava flows, toxic atmosphere. Embrace the fire!
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_desert_oasis_Descript: Water in the wasteland - desert tiles with life-sustaining rivers. Coastal access is a bonus!
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_defense_Description: Natural defensibility - mountains, caves, chokepoints, stone abundance. Build an impenetrable fortress.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_agrarian_Description: Maximum agricultural potential - fertile soil, perfect climate, water abundance, year-round growing. Feed the world.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_agrarian_FilterSummar: 50-60 Grow Days | Fertile | High Rain | Flat
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_power_Description: Maximum power generation - geothermal, hydro, wind, solar. Energy independence through diversified infrastructure.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_bayou_Description: Hot, wet, diseased marshlands - swamps, mud, difficult terrain, overgrown vegetation. Swamp horror survival.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_savannah_Description: Warm grasslands with abundant wildlife, wind, open terrain - perfect for hunting, herding, and wind power.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_aquatic_Description: Maximum water access - coastal tiles with rivers, lakes, headwaters. Fish, trade, and naval supremacy.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_homestead_Description: Move-in ready! Find abandoned settlements and ancient structures with existing buildings to salvage.
LanguageData.LandingZone_PresetSavedWithOverrides: [LandingZone] Saved user preset '{0}' with {1} quality overrides
LanguageData.LandingZone_ImportTokenInstructions: Paste a preset token below to import a shared preset. Tokens are compact, shareable strings that encode all filter settings.
LanguageData.LandingZone_PresetNameOptional: Preset name (optional - leave blank to keep original):
LanguageData.LandingZone_TokenExportedInstructions: Share this token with other players or keep it for backup. It has also been copied to your clipboard.
LanguageData.LandingZone_ImportanceExplanation_Critic:
[CRITICAL] Hard requirement - tiles MUST match this filter.
Used in Apply phase to eliminate non-matching tiles.
LanguageData.LandingZone_ImportanceExplanation_Prefer:
[PREFERRED] Soft preference - tiles are scored higher if they match.
Used in Score phase to rank surviving tiles.
LanguageData.LandingZone_ImportanceExplanation_Ignore: \n\n[IGNORED] Filter is disabled and won't affect results.
LanguageData.LandingZone_MatchDataDumped: Match data dumped to Player.log ({0} results)
LanguageData.LandingZone_MoreMatchesTruncated: ... and {0} more matches (truncated; enable verbose to log all)
LanguageData.LandingZone_FallbackTierManager_NoWorld: Fallback tier manager available when world is loaded
LanguageData.LandingZone_FallbackTierManager_NoCritic: Set filters to Critical importance to see fallback tiers
LanguageData.LandingZone_FallbackTierManager_Instruct: If current strictness is too restrictive, use these preset fallback tiers:
LanguageData.LandingZone_FallbackTierManager_NoAltern: No alternative tiers available (adjust strictness manually if needed)
